statements: SELECT * FROM email_stats;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, open_rate FROM email_stats ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, click_through_rate FROM email_stats WHERE sent_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_stats ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, opened_timestamp FROM email_stats WHERE opened_timestamp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY opened_timestamp ASC;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, sent_timestamp FROM email_stats WHERE open_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_click_through_rate FROM email_stats WHERE sent_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND clicked_timestamp IS NOT NULL
SELECT recipient_email, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_stats WHERE click_through_rate > open_rate ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT recipient_email, clicked_timestamp - opened_timestamp AS time_to_click FROM email_stats WHERE clicked_timestamp IS NOT NULL AND opened_timestamp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time_to_click ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT email_id, sender_email, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_stats WHERE open_rate < 0.2 AND click_through_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY open_rate, click_through_rate LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT email_address, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT email_address, click_through_timestamp FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_through_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT email_address FROM email_click_through_rates;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT email_address, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, email_address FROM email_click_through_rates ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT email_address) FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_address, click_through_timestamp FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_through_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT recipient_email, open_rate FROM emails WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT email_id, campaign_id FROM email_campaign_mapping JOIN emails ON email_campaign_mapping.email_id = emails.email_id WHERE open_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE open_rate > 0.5;
SELECT recipient_email, click_through_rate FROM emails WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.3 ORDER BY recipient_email DESC;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT emails.recipient_email, campaigns.campaign_name FROM emails JOIN email_campaign_mapping ON emails.email_id = email_campaign_mapping.email_id JOIN campaigns ON email_campaign_mapping.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT email_id, SUM(open_rate) AS total_open_rate FROM emails GROUP BY email_id HAVING SUM(open_rate) > 0.8 ORDER BY total_open_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recipient_id, email_address FROM recipients ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(open_id) AS total_opens FROM opens GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_opens > 10;
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_recipients FROM email_campaigns JOIN recipients ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = recipients.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name

SELECT campaign_name, email_address, open_timestamp FROM email_campaigns JOIN recipients ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = recipients.campaign_id JOIN opens ON recipients.recipient_id = opens.recipient_id ORDER BY open_timestamp

SELECT campaign_name, click_timestamp FROM email_campaigns JOIN recipients ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = recipients.campaign_id JOIN opens ON recipients.recipient_id = opens.recipient_id JOIN clicks ON opens.open_id = clicks.open_id ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM email_subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, open_datetime FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_datetime ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT subscriber_id, click_datetime FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE subscriber_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM email_subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT open_datetime, email_id FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_id > 100 ORDER BY open_datetime ASC;
SELECT email_id, open_count, click_through_count, conversion_rate FROM email_metrics WHERE click_through_count > 10 AND conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, click_through_count ASC;
